channel.title: Bows and Arrows
channel.description: Hi, if any1 could help me with this small prob itd be great...on my server i want normal bows like magic short and maple short to work with arrows when i weild them and i weild arrows it always says you have no arrows and no bow works except crystalif anyone knows how to make them work plz help ty.
